MessageReceivedInChannel.Name: Message received in channel
MessageReceivedInChannel.Description: Triggers when a message is received in a specific guild channel.

ChannelId.Name: Channel id
ChannelId.Description: The ID of the channel to monitor.

MessageId.Name: Message id
MessageId.Description: The ID of the received message.

Content.Name: Message content
Content.Description: The content of the received message.

SenderId.Name: Sender id
SenderId.Description: The ID of the sender of the message.

SenderUsername.Name: Sender username
SenderUsername.Description: The username of the sender of the message.

ReceptionTime.Name: Reception time
ReceptionTime.Description: The time when the message was received.

SendMessageToChannel.Name: Send message to channel
SendMessageToChannel.Description: Sends a message to a specific guild channel as triggo bot.

ChannelId.Name: Channel id
ChannelId.Description: The ID of the channel to send the message to.

Content.Name: Message content
Content.Description: The content of the message to send.

MessageId.Name: Message id
MessageId.Description: The ID of the sent message.
